snippet.title: Wizardry 6 (HD) - Getting Started
snippet.description:
The beginning of a complete playthrough of Wizardry 6.  The video shows an edited version of my character creation process.  The party consists of a Dracon Valkyrie, a Dwarven Monk, a Felpurr Ninja, an Elven Bard, a Rawulf Priest, and a Faerie Mage.

For my complete guide to playing Wizardry 6: Bane of the Cosmic Forge, hosted by Sorcerer's Place, see this link:

http://www.sorcerers.net/Games/Wizardry/Wizardry-6-Walkthrough/index.php
